1121211.content:
Johnny thought about how to get rid of his parents. They were too strict and always yelled at him. After thinking about it for a minute, Johnny decided the best way would be to devour them. After all, he was pretty hungry. Meanwhile, Dukey was going crazy. The giant picked him up, causing his dog to become afraid.

“YOU KILLED SUSAN AND MARY! ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR MIND?” He yelled. Johnny smiled and shook his head.

“No, I’m just extremely powerful.” He said. He started to pet Dukey softly with one finger, causing him to shudder. “Now, since you’re my best friend I’ll give you a choice. You can become my personal servant and help me with my fun or I can crush you under my foot. If you want the second option, I’ll make it quick and painless.” Johnny explained.

Dukey thought about his options. He knew Johnny was being honest when he said he would give him an easy death. The power had gone to his head but the giant still had feelings for his friend. The dog also realized that it might be fun and rewarding to help Johnny. After a moment, he sighed.

“Ok Johnny, I’ll help you. Just promise you won’t hurt me.” Dukey said.

“Only if you betray me.” Johnny smiled and set Dukey down. “Now, I want you to bring my parents here. It’s time I dealt with them.” He said. Dukey nodded and did as he was told. As he waited, he pulled out Susan’s dead body.

“You shouldn’t have done all of those experiments on me. I’m not just some guinea pig.” Johnny said. He gave her a kiss before setting her on the ground. He moved his foot over her and completely crushed her body.

Within a few minutes Dukey (acting like a dog) brought his parents out. They were shocked when they saw his size. His father stomped up to him, pissed off. The giant smiled, knowing his dad couldn’t do anything.

“Johnny! What did I say about becoming a giant? And where are your sisters!? They are so grounded!” He yelled.

“Don’t worry about them. Instead, worry about yourselves.” Johnny said, picking up his parents. They started to struggle, unaware of the danger they were in.

“Johnny! Put us down this instant!” His mother yelled. The giant chuckled.

“Sorry but I don’t have to listen to you. Instead, I have a better idea.” Johnny licked his lips, eyeing his parents. It took them a few moments to realize what he meant. When they did, they started to struggle even more.

“JOHNNY! ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR MIND?” His father screamed.

“No, I’m just hungry.” He responded. Johnny tossed his father in and closed his mouth tightly. His mother watched in horror, imagining what her husband was going through. The giant tossed the man around, making sure he got a good taste. After a minute, he swallowed and gave a happy sigh.

“Meh, I didn’t really care for his taste. Maybe you’ll taste better.” Johnny said. He gave her slow lick, causing the woman to shudder. “Hm, maybe you’ll be tastier without your clothes.” The giant started to reach for her, causing the woman to scream.

“Wait! At least let me do it!” His mother yelled, causing the boy to hesitate. “If you’re going to eat me, at least let me get myself ready.” Johnny nodded and held her in his open hands.

The woman hesitated but eventually started to strip herself. She worked slowly, sad and afraid. As more skin was revealed, the giant smiled. Thoughts went through his mother’s mind. She was now just a piece of candy to him. It had also occurred to her that he might have done something to her daughters, but she didn’t want to know what. Once she was completely naked, she looked up at her son once more.

“Ok, I’m ready.” She said softly. Johnny brought her up to his mouth and gave her a lick. His tongue felt slimy but soft. His mother crawled in, causing him to close his mouth shut. He tossed her around, loving her taste. Johnny tasted her for a few minutes before swallowing. The giant gave a burp and smiled.

“Wow, she tasted really good!” He said. Dukey looked towards the city, then back at the giant.

“So…what’s your plan now?” He asked. The giant gave him a smile.
